messages.subject: Antai article
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone know the location of Han Bing Siong s detailed article on antai -- I think I m spelling it correctly -- that was in the JSS/US Newsletter many
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know the location of Han Bing Siong's detailed article on "antai" -- I think I'm spelling it correctly -- that was in the JSS/US Newsletter many years ago?

I'm trying to locate that article and possible a couple others to share with our local guys. Interesting feature to be aware of on a sword.

Ron
STL

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
